member.summary: The (x,y) acceleration.

member.name: T:milk.Components.SpriteComponent
member.summary: Associates one or more textures (in a `Sprite`) with a state.

member.summary: Plays / pauses the sprite's animation.

member.summary: Add a sprite (1 or more textures) to the component.

member.name: T:milk.Components.TriggerComponent
member.summary: Executes the specified callbacks when 2 triggers collide.

member.name: F:milk.Components.TriggerComponent.size
member.summary: The (x,y) size of the trigger.

member.name: F:milk.Components.TriggerComponent.offset
member.summary: The (x,y) offset from the entity top-left position.

member.name: F:milk.Components.TriggerComponent.onCollisionEnter
member.summary: Called once when 2 colliders first intersect.

member.name: F:milk.Components.TriggerComponent.onCollide
member.summary: Called for every frame that 2 colliders intersect.

member.name: F:milk.Components.TriggerComponent.onCollisionExit
member.summary: Called once when 2 colliders no longer intersect.
Creates a new trigger component.

The (x,y) offset from the entity top-left position.
Called once when 2 colliders first intersect.
Called for every frame that 2 colliders intersect.
Called once when 2 colliders no longer intersect.

member.name: T:milk.Core.Component
member.summary: A component stores data for systems to use, and has some useful additional callback methods.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Component.OnAddedToEntity(milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: This method is called automatically whenever a component is added to an entity.
member.param: The entity that the component has been added to.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Component.OnRemovedFromEntity(milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: This method is called automatically whenever a component is removed from an entity.
member.param: The entity that the component has been added to.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Component.ToString
member.summary: Debug entity string print method.
member.returns: A string output representing the entity.

member.name: T:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.EasingDelegate
member.summary: Represents a delegate for an easing function. An easing function takes a single float parameter (typically a normalized time value from 0 to 1) and returns a float value, which is the eased output.

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.Linear(System.Single)
member.summary: No easing, no acceleration.

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.SineEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (accelerating from zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.SineEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (decelerating to zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.SineEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (accelerating until halfway, then decelerating).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.QuadEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (accelerating from zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.QuadEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (decelerating to zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.QuadEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (accelerating until halfway, then decelerating).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.CubicEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (accelerating from zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.CubicEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (decelerating to zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.CubicEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (accelerating until halfway, then decelerating).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.QuartEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (accelerating from zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.QuartEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (decelerating to zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.QuartEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (accelerating until halfway, then decelerating).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.QuintEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (accelerating from zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.QuintEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (decelerating to zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.QuintEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (accelerating until halfway, then decelerating).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.ExpoEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (accelerating from zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.ExpoEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (decelerating to zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.ExpoEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (accelerating until halfway, then decelerating).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.CircEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (accelerating from zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.CircEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (decelerating to zero velocity).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.CircEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (accelerating until halfway, then decelerating).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.BackEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (pulls back slightly before accelerating).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.BackEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (overshoots the target slightly before settling).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.BackEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (pulls back at start, overshoots at end).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.ElasticEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (bounces in towards the target).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.ElasticEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (bounces out from the target).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.ElasticEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (bounces in then out).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.BounceEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in (bounces as it approaches the start).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.BounceEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing out (bounces as it reaches the end).

member.name: M:milk.Core.EasingFunctions.BounceEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing in and out (bounces at start and end).

member.name: T:milk.Core.Entity
member.summary: An Entity is a logical container for components. Systems in a Scene act on entities with the required set of components.

member.name: P:milk.Core.Entity.ID
member.summary: The unique ID of the entity.

member.name: P:milk.Core.Entity.Name
member.summary: The unique (not case-sensitive) name of the entity. Setting a non-unique, non-null name will raise an InvalidOperationException.

member.name: P:milk.Core.Entity.PreviousState
member.summary: The state of the entity in the previous frame.

member.name: P:milk.Core.Entity.State
member.summary: The current state of the entity.

member.name: P:milk.Core.Entity.Owner
member.summary: The owner Entity. This is set to itself if null is passed.

member.name: P:milk.Core.Entity.Delete
member.summary: Setting Delete = true marks an entity for deletion. Deletion happens at the end of each game loop.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Entity.bitMask
member.summary: The bitMask of an Entity uses each component ID to record which components are present for an entity.

member.name: P:milk.Core.Entity.Tags
member.summary: A list of string tags, used to categorise and/or identify an entity. Tags are stored as lower-case. They must be unique (non case-sensitive) per-entity, but the same tag can exist across multiple entities. (Repeated tags are ignored, and not added to an entities tag list.)

member.name: P:milk.Core.Entity.Visible
member.summary: Sets the visibility of an entity.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Entity.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.Boolean,milk.Core.Entity,milk.Core.Component[])
member.summary: Create a new entity.
member.param: The unique name of the entity.
A list of tags to identify and/or categorise the entity.
The state of the entity.
The entity visibility.
The parent of the entity.
A list of components to add to the entity.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Entity.HasComponent``1
member.summary: Checks whether the entity has a component of the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type of the component to check for.
member.returns: A boolean indicating the presence of a component.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Entity.AddComponent(milk.Core.Component[])
member.summary: Adds one or more components to the entity, overwriting an existing component if one exists.
member.param: One or more components to add.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Entity.GetComponent``1
member.summary: Returns the component of the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type of the componet to retrieve.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Entity.RemoveComponent``1
member.summary: Removes the component of the specified type (if one exists).
member.typeparam: The type of the component to remove.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Entity.AddTag(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds one or more tags, stored in lower-case with duplicates removed.
member.param: One or more tags to add.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Entity.HasTag(System.String[])
member.summary: Checks whether the entity has all of the tags specified. Tags are checked as lower-case.
member.param: One or more tags to check.
member.returns: A boolean, indicating the preence of all specified tags.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Entity.RemoveTag(System.String[])
member.summary: Removes the specified tags (if they exist).
member.param: One or more tags to remove.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Entity.ToString
member.summary: Debug entity string print method.
member.returns: A string output representing the entity.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Game.PrintSystems
member.summary: Returns a string showing the order of execution of systems.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Game.PositionSystemType``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Positions the system of the specified type at the requested position. This is useful for setting the order in which systems execute. (Use `PrintSystems()` to see the order of systems.)
member.typeparam: The type of system to move.
member.param: The new position of the system.

member.name: T:milk.Core.Scene
member.summary: A scene is a collection of entities and systems, and can be thought of as game 'screens'. Each system in a scene acts on all entities in the scene with the required set of components.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.content
member.summary: MonoGame content object for working with game assets.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.game
member.summary: The parent game object.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.spriteBatch
member.summary: The spriteBatch object.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.Size
member.summary: The (x,y) scene dimensions.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.Middle
member.summary: The (x,y) center point of the scene.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Background color.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.IncludeAlRegisteredSystems
member.summary: By default all systems are present in all scenes. Setting this to `false` allows control over which systems should be present within a scene.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.UpdateSceneBelow
member.summary: Specifies whether to update the scene below this one in the scene stack.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.InputSceneBelow
member.summary: Specifies whether to process input in the scene below this one in the scene stack.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.DrawSceneBelow
member.summary: Specifies whether to draw the scene below this one in the scene stack.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.EntitySortMethod
member.summary: Set a method for sorting entities.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.mapSize
member.summary: Set the size of the map. The size is set automatically if adding a Tiled Map.

member.name: P:milk.Core.Scene.Map
member.summary: A Tiled map.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.Velocity
member.summary: The scene's velocity, which is applied to all entities.

member.name: F:milk.Core.Scene.Acceleration
member.summary: The scene's acceleration, which is applied to all entities.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.#ctor
member.summary: A scene is a bit like a game 'screen' and holds entities and systems, along with other functionalilty such as cameras. Systems in a scene act on scene entities with the required set of components present.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.AddCamera(milk.Core.Camera)
member.summary: Adds a camera object to a scene.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.GetCameraByName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a camera with the specified (unique) name. The name is checked in lower-case.
member.param: The name of the camera to find.
member.returns: A camera, or null if no camera exists with the specified name.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.HasEntity(milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Returns `true` is the entity provided exists in the scene.
member.param: The entity to check.
member.returns: A Boolean indicating the presence of the entity in the scene.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.AddEntity(milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Adds an entity object to the scene.
member.param: The entity to add.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.RemoveEntity(milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Removes the specified entity from the scene. Note that the entity isn't 'deleted'.
member.param: The entity to remove.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.RemoveEntityByName(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the entity with the specified name from the scene.
member.param: The name of the entity to remove.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.RemoveEntitiesByTag(System.String[])
member.summary: Removes the entities with the specified tags from the scene.
member.param: One or more tags that the entities must have.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.RemoveAllEntities
member.summary: Removes all entities from the scene.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.GetEntityByName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the entity with the provided (unique) name. The name supplied is converted to lower-case.
member.param: The name to check.
member.returns: An entity if one is found, or null.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.GetEntitiesByTag(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets all entities that include all supplied tags.
member.param: One or more tags to check.
member.returns: A list of all entities with all tags. This is always a list, and could be empty.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.DeleteEntityByName(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the entity in the scene with the specified name. The name supplied is checked in lower-case.
member.param: The name of the entity to delete.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.DeleteEntitiesByTag(System.String[])
member.summary: Deletes all entities containing the specified tags. Tags are checked in lower-case.
member.param: One or more tags to

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.AddSystem``1
member.summary: Add a (registered) system type to a scene (calling this method isn't required if IncludeAlRegisteredSystems == true, which it is by default).
member.typeparam: The type of the registered system to add.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.RemoveSystem``1
member.summary: Removes the sysytem of the specified type from the scene.
member.typeparam: The type of system to remove.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.RemoveAllSystems
member.summary: Removes all systems from the scene

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.HasSystem``1
member.summary: Returns true if a system of the specified type exists in the scene.
member.typeparam: The type of system to find.
member.returns: Bool, true if a system of the specified type exists.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.GetSceneBelow(System.Collections.Generic.List{milk.Core.Scene})
member.summary: Gets the scene below this scene in the scene list (or null if there isn't one).
member.param: The scene list to check against.
member.returns: A scene, or null if no scene exists.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.AddTimedAction(System.Single,System.Action,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an action to execute after a set time.
member.param: The delay before executing the action.
The action to execute.
Optional name, to facilitate deletion.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.RemoveTimedActionByName(System.String)
member.summary: Remove a timed action by name, if one has been set.
member.param: The name of the action to remove.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.Init
member.summary: Called once when a scene is created.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.Update(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Called once per frame of the game loop, and handles scene-level updating.
member.param: The MonoGame gameTime object.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.Input(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Called once per frame of the game loop, and handles scene-level input.
member.param: The MonoGame gameTime object.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.Draw
member.summary: Called once per frame of the game loop, and handles scene-level drawing.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.OnEnter
member.summary: Called once when the scene becomes the active scene.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.OnExit
member.summary: Called once when the scene is no longer the active scene.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.OnEntityAdded(milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Called once whenever an entity is added to the scene.
member.param: The entity that has been added.

member.name: M:milk.Core.Scene.OnEntityRemoved(milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Called once whenever an entity is removed from the scene.
member.param: The entity that is being removed.

member.name: T:milk.Core.System
member.summary: A system within a scene runs on entities with the reqiured set of components.

member.name: F:milk.Core.System.spriteBatch
member.summary: MonoGame spriteBatch used for drawing.

member.name: P:milk.Core.System.DrawAboveEntities
member.summary: Decides whether the system Draw method is called before (below) or after (above) the entities are drawn.

member.name: P:milk.Core.System.DrawAboveMap
member.summary: Decides whether the system Draw method is called before (below) or after (above) the map is drawn.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.#ctor
member.summary: System constructor.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.AddRequiredComponentType``1
member.summary: Adds a component type that is required by an entity in order to be processed by the system.
member.typeparam: The type of the component required.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.Init
member.summary: Called once when a system is created.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.Input(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime,milk.Core.Scene)
member.summary: A top-level input method, called once per frame.
member.param: The MonoGame gameTime object.
The scene that the system is in.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.InputEntity(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime,milk.Core.Scene,milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: An entity-specific input method, called once per frame for each entity with the required set of components.
member.param: The MonoGame gameTime object.
The scene that the system is in
The entity to be acted upon.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.Update(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime,milk.Core.Scene)
member.summary: A top-level update method, called once per frame.
member.param: The MonoGame gameTime object.
The scene that the system is in.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.UpdateEntity(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime,milk.Core.Scene,milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: An entity-specific update method, called once per frame for each entity with the required set of components.
member.param: The MonoGame gameTime object.
The scene that the system is in
The entity to be acted upon.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.Draw(milk.Core.Scene)
member.summary: A top-level draw method, called once per frame.
member.param: The scene that the system is in.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.DrawEntity(milk.Core.Scene,milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: An entity-specific draw method, called once per frame for each entity with the required set of components.
member.param: The scene that the system is in
The entity to be acted upon.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.OnEnterScene(milk.Core.Scene)
member.summary: Called once when the scene becomes active;
member.param: The scene that the system is in.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.OnExitScene(milk.Core.Scene)
member.summary: Called once when the scene is no longer active.
member.param: The scene that the system is in.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.OnEntityAddedToScene(milk.Core.Scene,milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Called once when an entity is added to the scene containing the system.
member.param: The scene containing the system that the entity is being added to.
The entity being added to the scene.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.OnEntityRemovedFromScene(milk.Core.Scene,milk.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Called once when an entity is removed from the scene containing the system.
member.param: The scene containing the system that the entity is being removed from.
The entity being removed from the scene.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.OnAddedToScene(milk.Core.Scene)
member.summary: Called once when a system is added to a scene.
member.param: The scene the system is being added to.

member.name: M:milk.Core.System.OnRemovedFromScene(milk.Core.Scene)
member.summary: Called once when a system is removed from a scene.
